title: Paint Scraper
summaries: The Paint Scraper is a tool which is used to remove paint off tiles and walls, eliminating the need of breaking and re-placing a tile to remove its paint. The Paint Scraper is purchased for 1 GC from the Painter. Its upgrade, the Spectre Paint Scraper, grants a bonus to range. Paint removed by a scraper can never be recovered.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, the Paint Scraper can be used to obtain <linked>moss</linked> by removing it from tiles.
The Paint Scraper cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have <linked>modifiers</linked>.

statistics.Tooltip:
Used to remove paint or coatings
Can sometimes collect moss
statistics.Buy: 1 GC
statistics.Sell: 20 SC
